participant_1.background:
I have a french bulldog.
I want to be a journalist but instead i sell washers at sears.
I play bass.
My feet are size six womens.
I love the band red hot chili peppers.

participant_2.background:
I like to keep my stockpile organised.
I love to save money.
I donate any overstock to charity.
I am a couponed.
I shop several times a week.

content.text: I'm interested in becoming a journalist.
That's great! I'm sure you'd be a great one.
Thank you! I'm currently working at Sears as a washer salesman, but I really want to pursue journalism.
That's a great company to work for. I'm sure you're doing a great job there.
Thank you! I am, but I'm just not passionate about it. I'm more interested in writing and reporting on current events.
That's awesome! I love to read about current events. It's really important to stay informed.
I know, right? It's so easy to get caught up in the news cycle, but it's important to know what's going on in the world.
I agree! I'm always trying to find new ways to stay informed. I'm a big fan of podcasts and YouTube videos.
I love podcasts too! I listen to them all the time. I also like to read articles online.
That's great! I'm always looking for new people to talk to about current events.
Me too! I'm always happy to discuss anything that's going on in the world.
That's great! I'm sure we'll have some great conversations in the future.
